name: Stealth Prototype Demo
description:
Note: If the background corrupts, refresh the page until it comes clear.

In other stealth games, staying still is key... However, you have depleting health, and the only thing from keeping you from losing it all to keep moving! The remaining health is added as a score. Play through the 8 stage demo and try and get the best score!

Controls:

Left/Right - Move

Spacebar/ A Button - Use
